title: House
description: Available NOW: Welcome to 3228 W Diamond St #LL1! This is a stunning 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom bi-level apartment featuring exposed brick, recessed lighting, hardwood floors, mini-split a/c systems, common laundry, and more! Your main living space offers an open floor plan with great space for furniture arrangements. The modern kitchen is against the back wall boasting dark blue shaker cabinets, subway tile backsplash, and stainless steel appliances including overhead microwave, fridge, and electric stove / oven combo. Spiral stairs lead to your bedroom upstairs offering great sunlight, a ceiling fan for year-round comfort, and an attached bathroom.

title: Smoke-free apartments available, Elevator building
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: Clean 2 Bedroom Duplex Home in West End of Johnstown
description:
Clean, 2 bedroom, 2 story duplex home in the West End of Johnstown. Renovated and Spacious. Newly remodeled. Elegant ceiling fans. Modern eat-in kitchen with lots of cabinet and counter space. Stove and Refrigerator included. Luxurious vinyl plank flooring. Wall-to-wall carpet. Basement and attic storage area. First floor laundry room with washer and dryer hook-ups. Cozy warm gas hot water radiator heat. Newer energy-efficient gas furnace. Relaxing front porch and small covered private rear porch. Fencing down through the middle of the yard to give privacy from neighbor. Modern double-pane thermal windows with screens. Level back yard with space for activity. Updated bathroom with tub and shower combo. 900 square feet of living space. Located near prime bus route. Abundant street parking. Close to hospital, grocery, pharmacy, gas, and all services. One year or more lease. Available now. Only $685.00 Rent. Water, sewage, and garbage included in the rent. Tenant pays gas, electric, and lawncare. Only $685.00 Security Deposit. There is a $20 Application Fee for each occupant 18 years of age and older. We do an eviction and criminal search on each applicant. We cannot rent to anyone who has been evicted within the last five years. We do NOT rent to anyone who owes a former landlord for unpaid rent or for unpaid property damages. We do NOT rent to mean and nasty people or anyone who causes trouble in the neighborhood. We want to rent this home to a polite and quiet family that is committed to being a positive force in the neighborhood. References and emergency contacts are required. Address of available home is 82 Barron Avenue; Johnstown, PA 15906. Take Broad Street in Cambria City and turn on to Fairfield Avenue in the West End of Johnstown. Turn left on D Street. Take your first left on to Barron Avenue. Go a block or so and the home will be on your left. Park on the street. Call now to schedule your tour of this fine home. We are looking for a friendly tenant who pays their rent in full and on time, takes great care of the home, and respects their neighbors to lease this quality home. Won’t last long. Call now. Call  show contact info
.

Philadelphia, PA 19107

description:
You don't want to miss this gorgeous family home in the absolute perfect location. Nestled on a large lot right where you want to be, you will love this like-new (near Graduate Hospital) townhome close to all the best that Southwest Center City has to offer. Step inside this 3-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom home where you will immediately adore the bright and modern open concept entertainment space. Natural light filters in through the entire home, highlighting the gorgeous hardwood floors and spacious floor plan. The living room and dining area are completely open to the beautiful/modern kitchen where the chef of the family will feel right at home among the stainless-steel appliances, luxe granite countertops and plenty of black stained oak cabinets. Outside the entertainment space continues on your huge patio, fully fenced in and with plenty of shade. Lounge with your favorite book or take in a meal al fresco on a gorgeous summer day. The second floor houses the first two bedrooms and full bathroom as well as the conveniently placed laundry area. On the third floor find the master bedroom plus a gorgeous spa-like bathroom with spectacular walk-in shower and beautiful soaker tub. The lowest level of the home is a fully finished basement where you will find bonus living space plus plenty of room for storage. A truly gorgeous home in a great location, this one won't last long. Convenient to I-95, 676 and Girard Avenue, getting around the city is a breeze whether you're driving, taking public transportation or Uber/Lyft!

Driving Directions:
From Philadelphia airport I-95N: Take I-95N to 676 W (Exit 22) on the left. Keep to right onto Callowhill St. (exit). Turn right onto N. Fifth Street. Continue N. Fifth Street to Thompson Street. Make a right on Thompson Street.
DWELL is on your left-hand side at the corner of 2nd and Thompson Streets.
